body: Users want to easily await (or ignore) all their remaining handlers when they continue as new or exit the workflow.  Since we can't tell what they want, they should specify.

comments.body: See https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-dotnet/issues/261#issuecomment-2196788048 for a template to pattern-match from.

milestone.description: Provide maximum functionality around Workflow Update.

title: Provide a method to wait for handlers to finish
